channel.title: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community
channel.description:
Hello, We are a project that I and a few friends have been working on since late 2012, With the fall of RuneScape due to the EOC we are remaining with the old combat system and wanted to start a server that people can come play and just hangout in with the community. We are a 24/7 server, currently working on getting a better VPS than our last one. We aren't the biggest of communitys out there but we are trying and wanting to grow If you give us a chance we think you'd rather enjoy your stay with us. Feel free to stop by and give us a shot. Thanks, Hope to see you there.
Website: www.grabscape.com
Current Forums: www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com
Server Features:
All Skills working (Hunter, Summoning,Dungeoneering, and a PKING SKILL!) 100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes! Easy Money Making ( Thieveing or Hunter) Not to hard and not to easy xp rates with double xp weekends!
(Bosses Include)
King BLack Dragon Tormented Demons Corp Beast Dagg Kings God Wars Sea Troll Queen Nomad Lakhrahnaz Giant Sea Snake Avatar of Destruction Barrelchest Frost Dragons Mithril Dragons
(Minigames Include)
Pest Controll Duel Arena Warrior's Guild Barrow's (UnderGround) 20 Wave Jad! Zombie Minigame
(Great Pking Place's)
Edge ville Graveyard 44 Portal Greater Demons Ardy Lever
Nex Armour Primal Armour All Special attacks working! Downloadable Client Working Hope to see some of you there! Here are some Pictures! [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2hwmsya.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/9j0f4o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/wrx1fo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/o6lcb8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/qqtov4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fm8ah1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zzky14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1qljyu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34xexk8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qjev69.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2yyr0ir.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/izsufn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/3486q9t.png[/img]
Owner = Rex Co-Owner = Mod Jebus
Credits: Thanks to, Rex Mod Jebus

item.title: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“p3rdue, post:6, topic:481223”]Okay, you’re calling me retarded for saying all server’s are leeched.
You sir are the retard here, All server’s are 100% leeched from RuneScape itself, So how can you say i’m retarded for saying that?
Think before you speak.[/quote]False. The server is the part that the RSPS community did program. It’s the Client that’s RuneScapes.

Read full topic

Feel free to go to the General Server Discussion and use FroyoScape’s content.

item.title: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:16, topic:481223”]There’s plenty of good reason. A lot of people have owned servers in the past which were incredible compared to generic servers such as this and had put hundreds of hours of work into a base yet they got no-where because the majority of the player-base were hovering around servers with nothing there.

I don’t see the justice in someone such as you putting a few hours of work here and there in vs people who put hundreds of hours in and don’t get any recognition for it. I merely pointed an error on your part and you turned it into this.[/quote]

Don’t come to the advertisement section then, because nine out of ten servers will be like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community
item.dc:creator: @p3rdue p3rdue
item.description:
@p3rdue wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:481223”][quote author=p3rdue link=topic=599461.msg4212702#msg4212702 date=1359808596]
Okay, you’re calling me retarded for saying all server’s are leeched.
You sir are the retard here, All server’s are 100% leeched from RuneScape itself, So how can you say i’m retarded for saying that?
Think before you speak.
[/quote]
lol, why so hostile?

Prime example is Embattled, was one of the most unique RSPS around. Team_Rocket had a server in development which was incredibly unique, there wasn’t a skill that was featured in RS inside his server. If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t try and call me out.

If you want an example of a base that isn’t leeched you could take a look at RuneRebels, written from scratch and their base has been worked on for the best part of 5 years. Failing that, take a look at http://www.github.com/Hadyn/nova, another framework written from scratch. Don’t try and say just because a server uses a certain organisations ideas that it’s leeched.[/quote]

May not have been featured in RS, But everything that deals with Rs just a little is leeched no matter what.
So your argument doesn’t matter.
And why so hostile? Because people like you that always have to call someone out for trying to do something and have fun doing it.
Even if it is leeched which i know it was, We have worked hard to fix bugs,remove,add new things.
So if you haven’t even played our server, then why saying something about it if you don’t know?
That’s why i’m hostile, it’s because every time I try to advertise here I get crap from people like you.

Read full topic
item.source: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community

item.title: Grabscape | 24/7 Old School Server | Friendly Community

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“p3rdue, post:6, topic:481223”]Okay, you’re calling me retarded for saying all server’s are leeched.
You sir are the retard here, All server’s are 100% leeched from RuneScape itself, So how can you say i’m retarded for saying that?
Think before you speak.[/quote]
lol, why so hostile?

Prime example is Embattled, was one of the most unique RSPS around. Team_Rocket had a server in development which was incredibly unique, there wasn’t a skill that was featured in RS inside his server. If you don’t know what you’re talking about, don’t try and call me out.

If you want an example of a base that isn’t leeched you could take a look at RuneRebels, written from scratch and their base has been worked on for the best part of 5 years. Failing that, take a look at http://www.github.com/Hadyn/nova, another framework written from scratch. Don’t try and say just because a server uses a certain organisations ideas that it’s leeched.

Read full topic

@p3rdue wrote:

Hello, We are a project that I and a few friends have been working on since late 2012, With the fall of RuneScape due to the EOC
we are remaining with the old combat system and wanted to start a server that people can come play and just hangout in with the community.
We are a 24/7 server, currently working on getting a better VPS than our last one.
We aren’t the biggest of communitys out there but we are trying and wanting to grow
If you give us a chance we think you’d rather enjoy your stay with us.
Feel free to stop by and give us a shot.
Thanks, Hope to see you there.

Website:
www.grabscape.com

Current Forums:
www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com

Server Features:

All Skills working (Hunter, Summoning,Dungeoneering, and a PKING SKILL!)
100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes!
Easy Money Making ( Thieveing or Hunter)
Not to hard and not to easy xp rates with double xp weekends!
